item.title: Tips on designing hex stickers for #rstats packages
item.description: Earlier today on twitter, Eric asked me this question Looks terrific! What is your workflow for designing these? I may try one for the podcast soon — The R-Podcast (Eric) (@theRcast) January 31, 2019 Immediately after I replied I was using SketchApp, I realized he might be asking me about the actual “design workflow”. On this aspect, although I feel like I’m not the best person to say this but I did gain some experience through making the following 5 stickers.
